summary: Erkeil Team RS' Populated Skyrim Civil War is Reborn to enhance your game with Civil war immersion patrols and battles (Skyrim Legendary Edition compatible).
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=violet]* * * IMPORTANT NOTE * * *[/color]

[i]I'm not the Author of this mod, who gave free permission to player/modder community to use his assets.
Thanks to Erkeil Team RS!
Have fun with PSCW Reborn![/i]

[/b][b][color=violet]* * * * * * * * * * * * *[/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=violet][size=3][b] * * *[/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][/font][/center][font=Trebuchet MS]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73269/?][img]http://www.buongiornoweb.com/webmaster/gif_animate_gratis/db_gif/gif_special/gif_bandiere/italia/011.gif[/img][/url][/center]

[size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][size=3][b][color=violet]1) DESCRIPTION[/color][/b][/size][/color]
[/color][/color][/b]With Populated Skyrim Civil War Reborn (PSCWR) now Skyrim suffers really by a Civil War. Each hold (only exception Whiterun hold, according to lore) have own Imperial or Stormcloack patrols that guard the borders and enter into cities/villages to search for spies, enemies and bandits. Some patrols go over the borders to spy and attack enemy soldiers.
There are four great battles along the border of two factions, where more than 200 soldiers fight to death. And much other…[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffffff][size=2][font=Verdana][size=2][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffffff][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[/size][/font][/size][/color][/font][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/size][/color][/font][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffffff][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffff00][size=2][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]For now I've very partially changed the loot of commanders/chiefs/captains.
If you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74029/?]POPULATED IMPERIALS STORMCLOAKS BATTLES[/url] I strongly suggest you to [u]install only PSCWR patrols[/u], WITHOUT "Battles only".esp
[/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/color][/font]

[/size][/color][/font][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffffff][size=2][center][youtube]JrAXOpc2JNc[/youtube][/center]

[/size][/color][/font][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][b][color=violet]2) SPECIFICS[/color][/b][/color][/color][/color][/b][/color][/color][/b][color=#00ffff][b][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/b][/color]From THE ELDER SCROLL WIKIA: Initially, both the Empire and the Stormcloak Rebellion control four Holds. The Empire controls Falkreath, Haafingar, Hjaalmarch, and the Reach, while the Stormcloaks control Eastmarch, the Pale, the Rift and Winterhold. Balgruuf the Greater, Jarl of the central Whiterun Hold, remains uneasily neutral, but he will eventually side with the … once the war is joined.

[color=#ffff00][Patrols only .esp][/color]
- 12 Imperial Patrols (total n. 38 soldiers) that guard the borders and fight into and for Falkreath, Haafingar, Hjalmarch and The Reach Holds.
- 8 Stormcloak Patrols (total n. 24 soldiers) that guard the borders and fight into and for Eastmarch, The Pale, The Rift and Winterhold Holds.

[color=#ffff00][Battles only .esp][/color]
- 4 Imperial Armies (total n. 125 soldiers) fight 4 different battles (two are large scale 40 vs. 40).
– 4 Stormcloak Armies (total n. 125 soldiers) fight 4 different battles (two are large scale 40 vs. 40).
All soldiers are respawnable.

[/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][color=#ffff00]If you use Battles only (.esp) I suggest you to uninstall it after played once all the battle, for immersion and balance reason [color=#ffffff](battle casualties give to players an overwhelming loot).[/color]
This is the reason 'cause I don't repropose the original merged plug-in.

[/color][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffffff][size=2][font=Verdana][color=#ffff00][size=2][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]If you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74029/?]POPULATED IMPERIALS STORMCLOAKS BATTLES[/url] I strongly suggest you to [u]install only PSCWR patrols[/u], WITHOUT battles .esp
[/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/color][/font][/size][/color][/font][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][color=violet]3) COMPATIBILITY
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/b]Load the mod on the very top of your load order. It should be compatible with all other mods.[b]

[color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][color=violet]4) REQUIREMENTS
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/b]Nothing.[b]

[/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=violet]5) INSTALL WITH MOD ORGANIZER[/color][/b][/size][/font][/color][/color][/color][/b][/size][/font][/size][/font][/color][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ffff][size=3][b][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/b][/size][/color][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][/b][/size][/font][/b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3](ONLY) if you have trouble try these steps:
In MO/settings/plugins/fomod, set prefer to ‘false’ instead of true. It will run the external installer and so It should works[/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b].
[/b][/size][/font]
[color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][color=violet]6) CREDITS[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/color][/b]Erkeil Team RS did this mod (you find him on google). Thanks for giving permission to player/modder community to use freely this mod.

[b][color=violet]7) [/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=violet][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][color=violet][b]MODS EDITED BY ADOLPHEN [/b][/color][/size][/font][/color][/b]

files.name: Populated Skyrim Civil War Reborn
files.changelogHtml:
Partially changed the loot of commanders/chiefs/captains
Fully compatible with Skyrim Legendary Edition.
Fully compatible with USKP and USLEEP.
